property.name: Battleships repair at end of round
notes
property.value:
Europe - Alpha

This current mod reflects the A&A Europe edition.

ATTENTION:: As of 0.25, Convoy Centers are now working!

There are a few elements still to be added however, for example, the middle east territories
are counted as regular UK territories as their special rules are also not yet currently implemented.
Strategic bombing for now behaves exactly as regular Axis and Allies strategic bombing. Also
there is no extra Russia bonus of commandeering allied units and converting them to Russian owned
at this time. All units created by a nation will stay under ownership by that nation throughout
the entire game.

Credits: Triple_Elk (base-line), iron__cross (integration), Adam (convoy center code), and the rest of the team...
